summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Pamper Me Moisturizing Gel Gloves and Moisturizing Gel Booties Combo Pack (Blue) Review Date: 2013/09/06 Store: Pamper Me Average Rating: 3.0 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '13 x 13 x 6 inches', 'UPC': '689076034760'} Review Text: THE BEST HIGH QUALITY!!! These are the ones to get as these ARE lined with gel. Get from Turbie Twist for $15 for both pairs as others will charge you $28 just for the gloves!!!! Also, the other gloves are not lined with gel, just cotton gloves which really do nothing to help really chapped hands.

Wear for a week and your feet and hands like baby skin. Use with O'Keeffe's Foot and Hand Creams Review Title: THE BEST HIGH QUALITY!!! These are the ones to get as these ARE lined with gel. Get from Turbie Twist for $15 for both pairs Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: niceeshop(TM) 10 Compartments Sewing Bobbins Floss and Needlecraft Workbox Thread Organizer Container Box,Random Color Review Date: 2015/07/03 Store: Thaoya Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Thaoya', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Gram', 'Pattern': 'Solid', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'UPC': '621033352531'} Review Text: Never got it but the ones I did get were of good quality. Just getting anything out of China is difficult. Review Title: Never got it but the ones I did get were of good quality. Just getting anything out of China is difficult. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: LuxlockTM World's most secure Patented Replacement Earring Back in .925 Silver (Patent # US8365369) Review Date: 2018/03/12 Store: Luxlock Product Description: ['Whether you lost your earring backs or are just sick of uncomfortable backs, these LuxLock sterling silver backs are a perfect addition to your jewelry box. Simply slide them onto the post and they easily lock into place. From LuxLock *Includes two sets of earring backs and anti-tarnish pouch *Sterling silver *1 pair of Heart & 1 pair of Flower discs'] Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Material': 'Sterling Silver', 'Brand': 'Luxlock', 'Number of Pieces': '2', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Item model number': 'JME-999HF/NUT', 'Department': 'unisex-adult', 'Manufacturer': 'LuxLock™', 'Country of Origin': 'USA'} Review Text: They break easily, the flower part, would not recommend at all, better off getting the big plastic discs

[[ASIN:B009KBZ6PO Ear Back with 11mm Plastic Disc Surgical Stainless Steel (10-Pcs)]]

LOX are better

[[ASIN:B00CBW6VIU LOXTM Mega-Grip Earring Backs, 2 Pair Pack]] Review Title: Break easily, come apart, useless, bad design, LOX are BETTER Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: SXC Cosmetics Nail Polish Set, 24 Neon Pastel Colors 15ml/0.5oz Full Size Nail Lacquer Gift lot Review Date: 2018/12/27 Store: SXC Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'SXC', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Unit Count': '12.24 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '24', 'Number of Pieces': '24', 'Liquid Volume': '0.5 Fluid Ounces', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8.66 x 5.83 x 3.46 inches; 3.45 Pounds', 'UPC': '738964869509'} Review Text: This is a terrible product, they use cheap ingredients and the bottles are not full. First coat goes on VERY streaky and inconsistent coverage, and second coat impossible to get a consistent full coverage on the nail. You will see the difference immediately if you use OPI nail polish or like quality.

I tried more than one color, it is soooooo bad across the board.

Whatever powder they use to color is like chalk and whatever shellac used is very sub par and GOOPY. Will not order and only want a refund.

Going back to professional grade. Review Title: TERRIBLE, CHEAP PRODUCT, GOOPY, LOW quality, hard to use and Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: BORN PRETTY Nail Polish Set Magnetic Cat Eye Chameleon Nails Polish 3D Gorgeous Fingers 6ml 6 Bottles Set Need Magnetic Stick (Not Included) Review Date: 2019/01/21 Store: Born Pretty Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Born Pretty', 'Item Form': 'stick', 'Color': 'Black', 'Type': 'base', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Material Feature': 'Formaldehyde free, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1.224 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Number of Pieces': '6', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No'} Review Text: DOES NOT WORK< even bought a DIOD magent from Home Depot Review Title: DOES NOT WORK< even bought a DIOD magent from Home Depot Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: SKYMORE 4pcs Metallic Nail Polish Set Nail Art Kit Beauty Nail Art Set For Women Lady Girls Review Date: 2019/01/21 Store: Skymore Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4 x 3 x 2.9 inches; 9.59 Ounces'} Review Text: Very think and do not hold up. This item is severly overpriced and sent it back, very streaky and uneven color. I bought a different one.

I also would not recommend this brand to anyone, use OPI or KLEANCOLOR. These two are my favorites. The issue with OPI is that it is horribly overpriced so I get my colors on eBAY for around $4 each with shipping.

OPI, lays down a full color with first painting of the nails and second coat to make it perfect, KLEANCOLOR is about a 3 or 4 star next to OPI. I would not reccoment any other brand except these two as I have tried almost all of them and they are terrible. This includes all the ones from china, they are crap and you waste your money as it costs more since you have to apply so many layers and/or the bottles are 1/3 the size and just enought to apply it one time or maybe 2 full manicures. Review Title: Very think and do not hold up. This item is severly overpriced and sent it back Rating: 1.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
The purchase history reveals a discerning customer who prioritizes quality and value in beauty and grooming products. There is a consistent pattern of dissatisfaction with low-quality items, particularly nail polishes, which are often described as streaky, poorly formulated, or overpriced. The customer indicates a strong preference for established brands known for superior performance, often contrasting them with cheaper alternatives that fail to meet expectations.

Sentiment analysis shows a mix of positive feedback when products meet quality standards, like the gel gloves for skin care, while negative experiences with nail products significantly lower satisfaction ratings. This suggests a heightened sensitivity to product quality over price, despite also expressing concerns about cost, as indicated by references to obtaining higher-quality items at lower prices through alternative channels.

The recurring themes across various purchases highlight a focus on self-care and personal grooming, particularly in skin and nail care. The customer seeks effective, high-performing products and displays reluctance to accept inferior substitutes, emphasizing a clear preference for items that deliver tangible results. This analysis underscores a consumer who values quality, reliability, and efficacy in their shopping choices, often gravitating towards reputable brands and expressing skepticism about lesser-known alternatives.

target_interaction.title: Good, but other colors better
target_interaction.title_meta: SEPHORA Colorful Cheek Ink Gel - 04 Lotus - sheer red travel size 0.35 oz.
